# "OR" operation
def or_postings(posting1, posting2):
    p1 = 0
    p2 = 0
    result = list()
    while p1 < len(posting1) and p2 < len(posting2):
        if posting1[p1] == posting2[p2]:
            result.append(posting1[p1])
            p1 += 1
            p2 += 1
        elif posting1[p1] > posting2[p2]:
            result.append(posting2[p2])
            p2 += 1
        else:
            result.append(posting1[p1])
            p1 += 1
    return result
